description: This file defines an Angular component 'NotesListComponent' that displays a list of notes with search, tag filtering, archive toggling, and note creation functionalities. It interacts with a notes service to fetch and update notes, and uses Angular routing to navigate between views.

classes.name: NotesListComponent
classes.description: Main component to list, search, filter, create, open, and archive/unarchive notes.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and loads notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches notes from the backend based on current filters and sorting.

methods.name: createNew
methods.description: Navigates to the page for creating a new note.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Navigates to the note editing/view page for the selected note.

methods.name: toggleArchive
methods.description: Toggles the archived status of a note and refreshes the list.
